title: LG LED Assistant setThumbnailRc Directory Traversal Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of LG LED Assistant. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the /api/installation/setThumbnailRc endpoint. The issue results from the lack of proper validation of a user-supplied path prior to using it in file operations. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of the current user.
addtionnal_details: LG has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://lgsecurity.lge.com/bulletins/idproducts#updateDetails
timeline:
2023-03-10 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2023-08-25 - Coordinated public release of advisory
